dialogue: We were put in the same car.
I don't know. They covered our heads with a--
-A hood. They did it to me, too.
What's so hard about putting them back where they came from?
You've got to make a statement to the police.
But they're the ones who arrested us.
And now they're saying they didn't.
I'm sorry. I can't get involved in this.
You're the only person who saw him in there. I need your help. If I can't prove he was arrested--
Please, Eunice, you've got to leave.

...I still can't describe the excruciating hours I spent in prison, but I can guarantee you that I was there with your husband. Although I couldn't see him, I heard him say: Rubens Beyrodt Paiva. Before I was transferred, I heard his voice one last time, asking for water. I pray that the family will be reunited soon. Give my best to my old students Vera, Eliana, and Ana.
I'm sorry to call this late, Lino, but we've got a witness.
There's still time for a swim. Anyone?
